<h1 align="center">
  Tabsp's blog
</h1>

[![Netlify Status](https://api.netlify.com/api/v1/badges/5466870e-7326-4c2d-b25d-9f18feeacea9/deploy-status)](https://app.netlify.com/sites/peaceful-saha-dd2695/deploys)

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Clone code**

    ```shell
    git clone https://github.com/tabsp/website.git
    ```

1.  **Install dependencies**
    ```shell
    npm install -g gatsby-cli
    yarn install
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

    _Note: You'll also see a second link: _`http://localhost:8000/___graphql`_. This is a tool you can use to experiment with querying your data. Learn more about using this tool in the [Gatsby tutorial](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/tutorial/part-five/#introducing-graphiql)._

1. **Others**

    ```shell
    brew install nasm
    ```
